CancelUpdateStack.title: CancelUpdateStack
CancelUpdateStack.summary: Cancels an update operation on a stack. You can call this operation to cancel an update operation on a stack when the stack is being updated or created.

ContinueCreateStack.title: ContinueCreateStack
ContinueCreateStack.summary: Continues to create a stack after the stack fails to be created.

CreateChangeSet.title: CreateChangeSet
CreateChangeSet.summary: Creates a change set for a stack. You can view proposed changes before you execute the change set.

CreateStack.title: CreateStack
CreateStack.summary: Creates a stack that contains a collection of resources by using a Resource Orchestration Service (ROS) template.

CreateStackGroup.title: CreateStackGroup
CreateStackGroup.summary: Creates stack groups based on Resource Orchestration Service (ROS) templates. Stack groups allow you to create stacks within multiple Alibaba Cloud accounts across regions.

CreateStackInstances.title: CreateStackInstances
CreateStackInstances.summary: Creates stack instances in the specified accounts and regions.

DeleteStack.title: DeleteStack
DeleteStack.summary: Deletes a stack. You can specify whether to retain resources.

DeleteStackInstances.title: DeleteStackInstances
DeleteStackInstances.summary: Deletes stack instances in the specified accounts and regions. You can retain specific resources based on your business requirements when you call this operation.

DeregisterResourceType.title: DeregisterResourceType
DeregisterResourceType.summary: Deletes a resource type or a version of a resource type.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Queries a list of available regions.

DetectStackDrift.title: DetectStackDrift
DetectStackDrift.summary: Performs drift detection on resources in a stack to check whether the resources have drifted from the expected template configurations.

DetectStackGroupDrift.title: DetectStackGroupDrift
DetectStackGroupDrift.summary: Performs drift detection on stack groups to check whether the stack groups have drifted from the expected template configurations.

DetectStackResourceDrift.title: DetectStackResourceDrift
DetectStackResourceDrift.summary: Performs drift detection on resources in a stack to determine whether the resources have drifted from the expected configurations.

GenerateTemplateByScratch.title: GenerateTemplateByScratch
GenerateTemplateByScratch.summary: Generates a template for a resource scenario.

GenerateTemplatePolicy.title: GenerateTemplatePolicy
GenerateTemplatePolicy.summary: Generates the information about a policy that is required by a template.

GetAITask.title: GetAITask
GetAITask.summary: Queries the information about an AI task by task ID.

GetChangeSet.title: GetChangeSet
GetChangeSet.summary: Queries change sets. You can determine whether to query the templates of change sets.

GetDiagnostic.title: GetDiagnostic
GetDiagnostic.summary: Obtains the diagnosis details based on a specified diagnostic report ID.

GetFeatureDetails.title: GetFeatureDetails
GetFeatureDetails.summary: Queries the details of features that are supported by Resource Orchestration Service (ROS).

GetResourceType.title: GetResourceType
GetResourceType.summary: This topic provides an example on how to query the details of \`ALIYUN::ROS::WaitConditionHandle\`.

GetResourceTypeTemplate.title: GetResourceTypeTemplate
GetResourceTypeTemplate.summary: Generates a sample template based on a resource type.

GetServiceProvisions.title: GetServiceProvisions
GetServiceProvisions.summary: Queries the activation status and the RAM roles of an Alibaba Cloud service.

GetStack.title: GetStack
GetStack.summary: Queries the information about a stack in Resource Orchestration Service (ROS).

GetStackDriftDetectionStatus.title: GetStackDriftDetectionStatus
GetStackDriftDetectionStatus.summary: Queries the drift detection status of a stack.

GetStackGroup.title: GetStackGroup
GetStackGroup.summary: In this example, the information about a stack group named \\`MyStackGroup\\` is queried. The stack group is granted self-managed permissions and created in the China (Hangzhou) region.

GetStackGroupOperation.title: GetStackGroupOperation
GetStackGroupOperation.summary: Queries the information about a stack group operation in an Alibaba Cloud region.

GetStackInstance.title: GetStackInstance
GetStackInstance.summary: Queries the information about a stack instance that is associated with a stack group.

GetStackPolicy.title: GetStackPolicy
GetStackPolicy.summary: Queries the information about a stack policy in an Alibaba Cloud region.

GetStackResource.title: GetStackResource
GetStackResource.summary: For more information about common request parameters, see \[Common parameters]\(~~131957~~).

GetTemplate.title: GetTemplate
GetTemplate.summary: Queries the details of a template based on stacks, stack groups, change sets, or any custom template information.

GetTemplateEstimateCost.title: GetTemplateEstimateCost
GetTemplateEstimateCost.summary: Queries the estimated prices of the resources in a template.

GetTemplateParameterConstraints.title: GetTemplateParameterConstraints
GetTemplateParameterConstraints.summary: Queries the values of one or more parameters in a template.

GetTemplateScratch.title: GetTemplateScratch
GetTemplateScratch.summary: Queries the details of a resource scenario.

GetTemplateSummary.title: GetTemplateSummary
GetTemplateSummary.summary: Queries the information about a template resource by using the relevant template, stack, stack group, or change set.

ImportStacksToStackGroup.title: ImportStacksToStackGroup
ImportStacksToStackGroup.summary: Import stacks from multiple different accounts into a stack group.

ListAITaskEvents.title: ListAITaskEvents
ListAITaskEvents.summary: Queries the events of an AI task.

ListAITasks.title: ListAITasks
ListAITasks.summary: Queries a list of AI tasks.

ListResourceTypeRegistrations.title: ListResourceTypeRegistrations
ListResourceTypeRegistrations.summary: Queries the registration records of a resource.

ListResourceTypeVersions.title: ListResourceTypeVersions
ListResourceTypeVersions.summary: Queries the versions of resource types, including the resource types created by you and provided by Resource Orchestration Service (ROS).

ListResourceTypes.title: ListResourceTypes
ListResourceTypes.summary: This topic provides an example on how to query the list of resource types supported by Resource Orchestration Service (ROS).

ListStackEvents.title: ListStackEvents
ListStackEvents.summary: Queries a stack and the resource events of the stack.

ListStackGroupOperationResults.title: ListStackGroupOperationResults
ListStackGroupOperationResults.summary: Queries the results of an operation on a stack group.

ListStackGroupOperations.title: ListStackGroupOperations
ListStackGroupOperations.summary: Queries the information about stack group operations in an Alibaba Cloud region.

ListStackGroups.title: ListStackGroups
ListStackGroups.summary: Queries a list of stack groups in an Alibaba Cloud region.

ListStackInstances.title: ListStackInstances
ListStackInstances.summary: Queries the list of stack instances that are associated with a stack group in an Alibaba Cloud region.

ListStackOperationRisks.title: ListStackOperationRisks
ListStackOperationRisks.summary: Detects stack-related operation risks and returns missing permissions and the causes of the risks.

ListStackResourceDrifts.title: ListStackResourceDrifts
ListStackResourceDrifts.summary: The query token. Set this parameter to the NextToken value returned in the last API call.

ListStackResources.title: ListStackResources
ListStackResources.summary: This topic provides an example on how to query the resources in a specified stack. In this example, the resources in the stack whose ID is \`4a6c9851-3b0f-4f5f-b4ca-a14bf691\*\*\*\*\` in the China (Hangzhou) region are queried.

ListTagKeys.title: ListTagKeys
ListTagKeys.summary: Queries the tag keys that are added to resources in a template or stack in an Alibaba Cloud region.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are added to resources in a template or stack in an Alibaba Cloud region.

ListTagValues.title: ListTagValues
ListTagValues.summary: Queries the tag values that are added to resources in a template or stack in an Alibaba Cloud region.

ListTemplateVersions.title: ListTemplateVersions
ListTemplateVersions.summary: Queries the list of versions of a template.

MoveResourceGroup.title: MoveResourceGroup
MoveResourceGroup.summary: Moves a resource to a specific resource group.

PreviewStack.title: PreviewStack
PreviewStack.summary: Previews the information about a stack that you want to create based on a template. You can call this operation to verify whether the template resources are valid.

RegisterResourceType.title: RegisterResourceType
RegisterResourceType.summary: Creates a new resource type, or creates a new version for an existing resource type.

SetDeletionProtection.title: SetDeletionProtection
SetDeletionProtection.summary: Modifies the deletion protection setting for a stack.

SetResourceType.title: SetResourceType
SetResourceType.summary: Modifies a resource type or a version of a resource type.

SetStackPolicy.title: SetStackPolicy
SetStackPolicy.summary: Configures a stack policy for a stack.

SignalResource.title: SignalResource
SignalResource.summary: Sends a signal to a resource in a stack.

StopStackGroupOperation.title: StopStackGroupOperation
StopStackGroupOperation.summary: Stops an ongoing operation in a stack group.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Creates and adds tags to resources.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Removes tags from resources and then deletes the tags.

UpdateStackGroup.title: Update Stack Group
UpdateStackGroup.summary: Update an already created stack group.

UpdateStackInstances.title: UpdateStackInstances
UpdateStackInstances.summary: Updates stack instances in the specified accounts and regions.

UpdateStackTemplateByResources.title: UpdateStackTemplateByResources
UpdateStackTemplateByResources.summary: Eliminates stack drifts by performing drift detection.

ValidateTemplate.title: ValidateTemplate
ValidateTemplate.summary: Validates a template by using a template URL or template body. The template is used to create a stack.
